title: New to Android. Apps just spontaneously. One day there are 10 running, the next day 4.
content: Just moved from iphone to pixel.  I always hated my iphone, so it's easy to love my new pixel.  But I have one issue I can't figure out - apps just die.  As an experiment, I once started 8 apps.  The next day, 4 of them were still running.  Weird.  Is there some sort of timeout I can turn off?
